Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player

Class ExtraProdPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Player
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.ExtraProdPlayer
public class ExtraProdPlayer
extends Player
The type Extra Production player (it extends Player). It's the player with an ExtraProd LeaderCard.
